scripts.name: ast-for-funcs
scripts.description: Returns the corresponding AST for each function as Json object.

scripts.name: ast-for-funcs-dump
scripts.description: Prints the corresponding AST for each function as Json string to a file.

scripts.name: cfg-for-funcs
scripts.description: Returns the corresponding CFG for each function as Json object.

scripts.name: cfg-for-funcs-dump
scripts.description: Prints the corresponding CFG for each function as Json string to a file.

scripts.name: cfgToDot
scripts.description: Generates a dot graph for your cfg.

scripts.name: functions-to-dot
scripts.description: Generates a list of strings, each containing a dot graph for every internal function in the provided CPG.

scripts.name: graph-for-funcs
scripts.description: Returns the corresponding graph (AST+CFG+PDG) for each function as Json object.

scripts.name: pdg-for-funcs-dump
scripts.description: Prints the corresponding PDG for each function as Json string to a file.
